name: MPPlayableContentManagerContext
desc: An object representing the current state of the playable endpoint.

items.name: var contentLimitsEnforced: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether contents limits are enforced by the content server.

items.name: var endpointAvailable: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value representing whether the content server is available.

items.name: var enforcedContentItemsCount: Int
items.desc: Returns the number of content items that are displayed when content limiting is enforced.

items.name: var enforcedContentTreeDepth: Int
items.desc: The maximum depth of the navigation hierarchy allowed by the content server.

items.name: var contentLimitsEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether contents limits are enabled by the content server.
